description: Thief actor messages from legacy THIEF-MELEE and ROBBER-FUNCTION

THIEF_MELEE_MISS: The thief stabs nonchalantly with his stiletto and misses.
You dodge as the thief comes in low.
You parry a lightning thrust, and the thief salutes you with a grim nod.
The thief tries to sneak past your guard, but you twist away.
THIEF_MELEE_UNCONSCIOUS: Shifting in the midst of a thrust, the thief knocks you unconscious with the haft of his stiletto.
THIEF_MELEE_KILL: Finishing you off, the thief inserts his blade into your heart.
The thief comes in from the side, feints, and inserts the blade into your ribs.
The thief bows formally, raises his stiletto, and with a wry grin, ends the battle and your life.
THIEF_MELEE_LIGHT_WOUND: A quick thrust pinks your left arm, and blood starts to trickle down.
The thief draws blood, raking his stiletto across your arm.
The stiletto flashes faster than you can follow, and blood wells from your leg.
The thief slowly approaches, strikes like a snake, and leaves you wounded.
THIEF_MELEE_SERIOUS_WOUND: The thief strikes like a snake! The resulting wound is serious.
The thief stabs a deep cut in your upper arm.
The stiletto touches your forehead, and the blood obscures your vision.
The thief strikes at your wrist, and suddenly your grip is slippery with blood.
THIEF_MELEE_STAGGER: The butt of his stiletto cracks you on the skull, and you stagger back.
The thief rams the haft of his blade into your stomach, leaving you out of breath.
The thief attacks, and you fall back desperately.
THIEF_MELEE_DISARM: A long, theatrical slash. You catch it on your {weapon}, but the thief twists his knife, and the {weapon} goes flying.
The thief neatly flips your {weapon} out of your hands, and it drops to the floor.
You parry a low thrust, and your {weapon} slips out of your hand.
THIEF_MELEE_PAUSE: The thief, a man of superior breeding, pauses for a moment to consider the propriety of finishing you off.
The thief amuses himself by searching your pockets.
The thief entertains himself by rifling your pack.
THIEF_MELEE_FINAL_BLOW: The thief, forgetting his essentially genteel upbringing, cuts your throat.
The thief, a pragmatist, dispatches you as a threat to his livelihood.
THIEF_APPEAR_WITH_BAG: Someone carrying a large bag is casually leaning against one of the walls here. He does not speak, but it is clear from his aspect that the bag will be taken only over his dead body.
THIEF_APPEAR_WITH_STILETTO: You feel a light finger-touch, and turning, notice a grinning figure holding a large bag in one hand and a stiletto in the other.
THIEF_LEFT_ROBBED: The thief just left, still carrying his large bag. You may not have noticed that he
THIEF_LEFT_EMPTY: The thief, finding nothing of value, left disgusted.
THIEF_LEFT_IN_DARK: The thief seems to have left you in the dark.
THIEF_TELL: The thief is a strong, silent type.
THIEF_HELLO_UNCONSCIOUS: The thief, being temporarily incapacitated, is unable to acknowledge your greeting with his usual graciousness.
THIEF_KNIFE_THROWN_FLEE: You evidently frightened the robber, though you didn't hit him. He flees
THIEF_KNIFE_THROWN_MISS: You missed. The thief makes no attempt to take the knife, though it would be a fine addition to the collection in his bag. He does seem
THIEF_GIFT_VALUABLE: The thief is taken aback by your unexpected generosity, but accepts the {item} and stops to admire its beauty.
THIEF_GIFT_WORTHLESS: The thief places the {item} in his bag and thanks you politely.
THIEF_RECOVER_CONSCIOUSNESS: Your proposed victim suddenly recovers consciousness.
THIEF_EXAMINE: The thief is a slippery character with beady eyes that flit back and forth. He carries, along with an unmistakable arrogance, a large bag over his shoulder and a vicious stiletto, whose blade is aimed menacingly in your direction. I'd watch out if I were you.
THIEF_LISTEN: The thief says nothing, as you have not been formally introduced.
THIEF_REVIVE: The robber revives, briefly feigning continued unconsciousness, and, when he sees his moment, scrambles away from you.
THIEF_DEATH_MAGIC_FADE: As the thief dies, the power of his magic decreases, and his treasures reappear:
THIEF_GESTURES_VANISH: The thief gestures mysteriously, and the treasures in the room suddenly vanish.
BAG_EXAMINE_UNDERNEATH: The bag is underneath the thief, so one can't say what, if anything, is inside.
